state_analysis: Excellent! The production_db database has been created successfully and both tables (users and transactions) are now present. Now I need to clean the data files and import them. explanation: Examining the complete users_export.csv and transactions_backup.json files to identify corrupted/invalid data that needs to be cleaned.
